After 2 qwwks of delivery they were asking me the shipping label. I showed them the item with all the label attached, I ahowed them the box. They kept asking for the shipping label. Stay away! Linking my RuPay card was instant. I have already earned Rs. 300 cashback in a few days of shopping and payments.

Extremely poor experience. Transactions frequently get declined after the money has already been debited from my account, which is completely unacceptable and stressful. Getting refunds takes too long, if they happen at all. On top of that, customer support is unresponsive and unhelpful, offering no real solutions. This app is unreliable and not trustworthy for handling financial transactions. I strongly recommend avoiding it until these serious issues are fixed.

Just another UPI app with a virtual thrift store where you can save a little with the reward coins. Currently it offers only UPI payments and doesn't offer the recharge and utility bill payments. If they continue to provide reward coins at the current phase which could be redeemed for utility payments later, then only it will be best in their segment
